resources.string: Swipe from the top to the bottom
(long press will start the machine poking)
Swipe left/right to switch the scheme
To change the layout of the drawing
Background at the launch will be random

Generate a Wallpaper

 created Deomin Dmitriy 2017

 lib:
 crop-https://github.com/biokys/cropimage 
 image-com.squareup.picasso:picasso:2.5.2 
 com.makeramen:roundedimageview:2.2.1 


 The picture is generated randomly(Sunny beach), each following a unique 

 Click on the logo to change the background color 
 Long tap on the logo will retain/remove the color
If not needed , or brakes off
When you click generate the first Wallpaper displayed where which button is
After pressing the top of the screen(save Button ) the picture is automatically set to Wallpaper phone

Before installing(if enabled above) will be asked to crop the picture to effect a scroll (if a lot of desktops).If the table is one we recommend to turn off pruning(the picture quality when you crop falls)
Automatic poking 1000 = 1 second (a long press at the bottom of the screen to start )
